intro: Hintonia latiflora, commonly known as the broadleaf hintonia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its broad, lance-shaped leaves. The plant produces clusters of small, tubular flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. It thrives in well-drained soils and prefers full sun to partial shade. Hintonia latiflora is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and landscapes.
